params.name: N_holes_ITI
params.description: Either 0, 1, or 2. If 0, no holes are created. If 1, a single hole is created centered along length. If 2, two holes are created centered with midway point of cuff and separated by Pitch_holecenter_holecenter.

params.name: Theta_ITI
params.description: Degrees of wrap around of the cuff. If 360, the cuff is a complete circle. If 180, the cuff is a half circle. E.g., if 90, the cuff is a quarter circle.

params.name: Center_IT
params.description: Center of the cuff along the length of the nerve (i.e., z-axis).

params.name: R_in_ITI
params.description: Radius of the inner surface of the cuff.

params.name: R_out_ITI
params.description: Radius of the outer surface of the cuff.

params.name: L_IT
params.description: Length of the cuff along the nerve (i.e., z-axis).

params.name: Rot_def_ITI
params.description: Rotation orientation of the cuff. E.g., If 0, the cuff is aligned with the x-axis. If 90, the CW surface cuff slit is aligned with the y-axis. If 180, the CW surface cuff slit is aligned with the negative x-axis.

params.name: D_hole_ITI
params.description: Diameter of the cutout hole(s) in the inner cuff (i.e., not the furl)

params.name: Buffer_hole_ITI
params.description: Manufacturing buffer around the hole(s) cut in the inner cuff (i.e., not the furl) for added radial length (half inside and half outside). Should not affect final dimensions.

params.name: L_holecenter_cuffseam_ITI
params.description: Length from the cuff seam around the cuff circumference to the center of the hole(s) cut in the inner cuff (i.e., not the furl).

params.name: N_holes_ITF
params.description: Number of holes in the furl. If 0, no holes are created. If 1, a single hole is created centered along length. If 2, two holes are created centered with midway point of cuff and separated by Pitch_holecenter_holecenter.

params.name: Theta_ITF
params.description: Angle of wrap around of the furl. If 360, the furl is a complete circle. If 180, the furl is a half circle. E.g., if 90, the furl is a quarter circle.

params.name: R_in_ITF
params.description: Radius of the inner surface of the furl.

params.name: R_out_ITF
params.description: Radius of the outer surface of the furl.

params.name: Rot_def_ITF
params.description: Rotation orientation of the furl. E.g., If 0, the furl is aligned with the x-axis. If 90, the CW surface furl slit is aligned with the y-axis. If 180, the CW surface furl slit is aligned with the negative x-axis.

params.name: D_hole_ITF
params.description: Diameter of the cutout hole(s) in the furl.

params.name: Buffer_hole_ITF
params.description: Manufacturing buffer around the hole(s) cut in the furl for added radial length (half inside and half outside). Should not affect final dimensions.

params.name: L_holecenter_cuffseam_ITF
params.description: Length from the cuff seam around the cuff circumference to the center of the hole(s) cut in the furl.

params.name: theta_cuff_pre_ITI
params.description: Angle of the cuff before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: r_cuff_in_pre_ITI
params.description: Radius of the cuff before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: thk_medium_gap_internal_ITI
params.description: Thickness of the medium gap between the nerve and the cuff for saline

params.name: thk_cuff_ITI
params.description: Thickness of the cuff

params.name: r_cuff_out_pre_ITI
params.description: Radius of outer diameter of the cuff before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: Pitch_holecenter_holecenter_ITI
params.description: Pitch between the centers of the holes in the cuff

params.name: theta_cuff_pre_ITF
params.description: Wrap angle of the furl before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: r_cuff_in_pre_ITF
params.description: Radius of the furl before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: thk_gap_cuff_furl_IT
params.description: Thickness of the gap between the cuff and the furl

params.name: thk_furl_ITF
params.description: Thickness (radial) of the furl

params.name: r_furl_out_pre_ITF
params.description: Outer radius of the furl before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: r_furl_in_pre_ITF
params.description: Inner radius of the furl before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: Pitch_holecenter_holecenter_ITF
params.description: Distance between the centers of the holes in the furl

params.name: diam_contact_ITC
params.description: Diameter of the contact

params.name: Recess_ITC
params.description: How far the contact is recessed into the cuff

params.name: Round_def_ITC
params.description: 1 if contact surface is circle when flattened, 2 if contact is circle when looking head-on after deformation to cuff

params.name: Contact_depth_ITC
params.description: Thickness of the contact

params.name: Overshoot_ITC
params.description: Manufacturing overshoot of the contact, should not affect final dimensions

params.name: length_contactcenter_contactcenter_ITC
params.description: Separations of contacts along the length of the cuff, from contact center to contact center

params.name: ang_cuffseam_contactcenter_ITC
params.description: Angle from the cuff seam to the first contact center after expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: ang_cuffseam_contactcenter_pre_ITC
params.description: Angle from the cuff seam to the first contact center before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: ang_contactcenter_contactcenter_ITC
params.description: Angle between contact centers after expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: ang_contactcenter_contactcenter_pre_ITC
params.description: Angle between contact centers before expansion to accommodate the nerve

params.name: Thk_fill_IT
params.description: Thickness of the fill material extending beyond the cuff
